subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: J. J. Hardy hit two home runs a day after his 16-game hitting streak ended to lead the Milwaukee Brewers to an 11-6 win and a three-game sweep against the Pittsburgh Pirates at home on Sunday.
snippet: J. J. Hardy hit two home runs a day after his 16-game hitting streak ended to lead the Milwaukee Brewers to an 11-6 win and a three-game sweep against the Pittsburgh Pirates at home on Sunday.
